auth_config.name: api_key
auth_config.label: API Key
auth_config.message: This API key will be used for accessing APIs.

from.text: Not required if template_id is present and template has default sender set

reply_to.text: Reply to email address and name

subject.text: Not required if template_id is present and template has default subject set

text.text: Email represented in a text (text/plain) format

attachments.text: Array of attachment objects with filename and content (base64 encoded)

template_id.text: Template ID to use for the email

tags.text: Array of tags (limit is max 5 tags)

precedence_bulk.text: This parameter will override domain's advanced settings

send_at.text: Has to be a Unix timestamp

headers.text: Custom headers (this feature is available to Enterprise accounts only)

tags.text: Array of tags (limit is max 5 tags)

meta.description: Get a list of all domains

Get a list of all templates
Get a list of all webhooks

events.text: Array of event types to subscribe to
Array of event types to subscribe to

meta.description: Get a list of activity events

recipients.text: Array of email addresses to add to bounces
Array of email addresses to add to unsubscribes

meta.description: Get a list of spam complaints

recipients.text: Array of email addresses to add to spam complaints

meta.description: Add email addresses to spam complaints
Get a list of all tokens

scopes.text: Array of scopes for the token

meta.description: Get a list of all recipients
Get a list of all recipient lists

recipient_ids.text: Array of recipient IDs to add to the list

routes.text: Remove a recipient from a list

meta.description: Remove a recipient from a list
